alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 2:10PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Trumbull, Geauga, east central Cuyahoga, east central Lake, Ashtabula, southern Erie and northwestern Crawford Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 210 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Waterford to near South Russell. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Conneaut, Chardon, Solon, Warrensville Heights, Edinboro, South Russell, Union City, Middlefield, Cambridge Springs, North Bloomfield, Orwell, Waterford, Albion, Burton, Andover, Linesville, West Farmington, Pymatuning Central, Harmonsburg and Pymatuning North. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Ashtabula Inland; Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake; Trumbull
